Package de.oth.blocklib.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Contains all important informations about a client
    ClientAvatar
    Represents another player on a server
    ClientAvatarBluePrint
    Contains the informations for the main thread to create a ClientAvatar
    ClientContext
    The context of the client and the client specific singletons
    ClientEntityManager
    The EntityManager for the client to handle entities and message the server
    ClientListenerManager
    Contains all listeners for the network messages that can be send to a client
    For additional listeners use the pattern:
    networkManager.registerMessageListener(YourNewNetworkClass.class, (NetworkMessage networkMessage, NetworkConnection networkConnection) -> { your code to be executed});
    Dont forget to add your new message class to the MessageRegistry
    ClientNpcCreator
    Stores blueprints and creates npcs
    ClientWorldInteraction
    The WorldInteraction for the client to interact with the world and message the server
